com.rulescape.odmtest.api.engine

Interface EngineExecutionListener


  • public interface EngineExecutionListener
    Custom rule engine listeners can be added by implementing this interface and activating them through RuleTestSessionConfig annotation. Listener methods, as described below, are invoked before and after each invocation and also at the end of the entire test run. This Listener may be cached and reused between test runs -- use reset() to reinitialize the listener.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleEnd(RuleExecutionResponse response)
      This method is invoked on the listener after each call to the rule engine.
      void handleException(RuleExecutionRequest request, java.lang.Exception exception)
      This method is invoked on the listener if an exception is thrown by the rule engine during execution.
      void handleRunComplete()
      This method is invoked on the rule engine after all the tests have been executer.
      void handleStart(RuleExecutionRequest request)
      This method is invoked on the listener before each call to the rule engine.
      void reset()
      This method is invoked on the listener at the end of a run (after the call to handleRunComplete).

    • Method Detail

      • handleEnd

        void handleEnd(RuleExecutionResponse response)
        This method is invoked on the listener after each call to the rule engine.
        Parameters:
        response - the response received from the rule engine

      • handleException

        void handleException(RuleExecutionRequest request,
                     java.lang.Exception exception)
        This method is invoked on the listener if an exception is thrown by the rule engine during execution.
        Parameters:
        request - the request passed in to the rule engine.
        exception - the exception thrown by the rule engine during execution.

      • handleRunComplete

        void handleRunComplete()
        This method is invoked on the rule engine after all the tests have been executer. This is where any aggregation/summarization should take place and any report generated.

      • handleStart

        void handleStart(RuleExecutionRequest request)
        This method is invoked on the listener before each call to the rule engine.
        Parameters:
        request - the request passed in to the rule engine

      • reset

        void reset()
        This method is invoked on the listener at the end of a run (after the call to handleRunComplete). Any preparation of the listener for the next run, such as clearing stats for this run, must be handled here.
